text: For consumer-packaged goods giant Mondelēz International, its digital transformation is a work in progress. Company officials have set a goal to generate 20% of its sales by 2030 through digital commerce.

title: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About Mondelez (MDLZ) Q4 Earnings
text: The headline numbers for Mondelez (MDLZ) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended December 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

title: Mondelez (MDLZ) Lags Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
text: Mondelez (MDLZ) came out with quarterly earnings of $0.65 per share, missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.66 per share. This compares to earnings of $0.84 per share a year ago.

title: Mondelez misses fourth-quarter revenue estimates
text: Cadbury-parent Mondelez International missed Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as higher prices for its chocolates and biscuits hurt demand during the crucial holiday season.

title: 3 Undervalued Stocks to Buy Before the Big Game This Weekend
text: The cheap stocks of these game-day advertisers look like good long-term investments. 00:00 Introduction 00:46 Anheuser-Busch InBev BUD 01:27 Mondelez MDLZ 01:58 Hershey HSY What's next is now at the Morningstar Investment Conference.

title: My Top 10 High-Yield Dividend Stocks For February 2025
text: SPY kicks off 2025 with a gain of 2.67% in January. VYM is off to an even better start with a gain of 3.75%. The top 10 stocks on the watchlist for February 2025 offer a 3.43% dividend yield, nearly triple that of the S&P 500. My top 10 list of high dividend yield stocks has generated an annualized rate of return of 15.95% since its inception in November 2020.
